attributes.action: address sexual harrassment in the public sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the Uk govt is going to recruit cockle pickers to work alongside Uk citizens, please can you orientate them a bit better about the Sexual Discrimination Act ? Do I need to be any more explicit without causing embarrassment to the policy ??

Thank you.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
